Detailed Description

(DEPRECATED) Office configuration object.

Deprecated:
This class will be removed at the same time as Agent::GetDeviceConfigurationForOffice() and will not have a replacement. The time of removal is TBD.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

◆ OfficeConfig() [1/2]

IonicSecurity::SDK::GetDeviceConfigForOfficeResponse::OfficeConfig::OfficeConfig ( )

Initializes the object to be empty.

Initialize default values of:

AllowCutCopy : True
AllowPrint : True
SaveAsUnprotected : DEFAULT_UNPROTECTED
SaveAsProtected : DEFAULT_PROTECTED
FileMetaReporting : OFF
